name: PsoriasisTreatmentTipsforTeens
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Psoriasis Treatment Tips for Teens is intended to educate and encourage teens who have been diagnosed with psoriasis. Psoriasis Treatment Tips for Teens is also for anyone with psoriasis, as well as family and friends who want to learn more about living with psoriasis, and to stay up-to-date on treatments and clinical trials. Every day, a new audio clip delivers pertinent information, including tips and suggestions for teen psoriasis patients, excerpts from pertinent books or articles, information on treatments, and encouraging ideas and observations from teen psoriasis patients themselves. 

To get started, all you need is a current Alexa account. Add to your Flash Briefing and you are good to go!

---
This tool does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
